trans-unit.source: Provides data for an event that is raised by calling the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.CurrentNode*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para um evento que é gerado por chamar o <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.CurrentNode*>propriedade o <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"> </xref> classe</xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.CurrentNode*>

trans-unit.source: The SiteMapResolveEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.ResolveSiteMapNode%2A> method to enable subscribers to the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve> event to return an instance of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> class.
trans-unit.target: A classe SiteMapResolveEventArgs é usada no <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.ResolveSiteMapNode%2A>método para permitir que os assinantes do <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve>evento para retornar uma instância da <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>classe.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.ResolveSiteMapNode%2A>

trans-unit.source: By adding an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve> event, you can create a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> representation of a page without implementing a custom site map provider.
trans-unit.target: Adicionando um delegado de manipulador de eventos para lidar com o <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve>eventos, você pode criar um <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>representação de uma página sem implementar um provedor de mapa de site personalizado.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventArgs"> </xref> classe usando especificado <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Both the `context` and `provider` parameters might be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Tanto o `context` e `provider` parâmetros podem ser `null`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> object initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventArgs> class with values that are not `null`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>objeto inicializa uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventArgs>classe com valores que não são `null`.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> that represents the context of the current page request.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> que representa o contexto da solicitação de página atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> that raised the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"> </xref> que gerou o <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the context of the page request that the requested node represents.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o contexto da solicitação de página que representa o nó solicitado.

trans-unit.source: Event subscribers can use the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> objects to dynamically create a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object and retrieve information about the requested page, such as the requested URL, as well as user information.
trans-unit.target: Os assinantes do evento podem usar o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>e <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>objetos para criar dinamicamente uma <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>de objeto e recuperar informações sobre a página solicitada, como a URL solicitada, bem como informações do usuário.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>, if one is specified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>, se um for especificado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> object that raised the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"> </xref> objeto que gerou o <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Event subscribers can use the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> objects to dynamically create a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object and retrieve information about the requested page, such as the requested URL, as well as user information.
trans-unit.target: Os assinantes do evento podem usar o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>e <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>objetos para criar dinamicamente uma <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>de objeto e recuperar informações sobre a página solicitada, como a URL solicitada, bem como informações do usuário.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> that raised the event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if no provider is specified during the <xref uid="langword_csharp_EventArgs" name="EventArgs" href=""></xref> object construction.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"> </xref> que disparou o evento; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, se nenhum provedor é especificado durante a <xref uid="langword_csharp_EventArgs" name="EventArgs" href=""> </xref> construção do objeto.
